meanings.definition: A general rule or principle that provides direction or advice.
meanings.sent1: Following the guideline to always wash your hands before eating is important for staying healthy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher gave us a guideline to follow for completing our homework assignments.
meanings.sent3: I tried to juggle while standing on one leg, but that's definitely not a guideline for success!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness towards others is a shining guideline for how we should treat one another.
meanings.sent5: The guideline to look both ways before crossing the street is a simple yet life-saving rule.

meanings.definition: A recommended course of action or procedure.
meanings.sent1: The guideline for fixing a leaky faucet is to turn off the water supply first.
meanings.sent2: The company has a strict guideline for submitting expense reports on time.
meanings.sent3: Trying to dance the tango without any rhythm is definitely not a guideline for success!
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor in stressful situations is a guideline for how to handle pressure gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The guideline to always double-check your work before submitting it can prevent costly mistakes.
